lsfType.title: lsf type
lsfType.description:
Possible values are: 
 * **gaussianConstantWidth**, 
 * **gaussianConstantResolution**, 
 * **gaussianNISPSIM2016**, 
 * **gaussianNISPVSSPSF201707**: nisp psf model as of 2017/07 
 * **fromSpectrumData**: Use LSF present in the input spectrum to compute the spectral resolution. LSF is spectra dependent 
 * **gaussianVariableWidth**: Use LSF present in file and that corresponds to variable width LSF. 
 LSF is common to all spectra

width.title: lsf width value
width.description: Must be specified if and only if LSFType=gaussianConstantWidth

resolution.title: Instrument resolution
resolution.description: Must be specified if and only if LSFType=gaussianConstantResolution

sourceSize.title: Source size
sourceSize.description: Must be specified if and only if LSFType=gaussianNISPVSSPSF201707

gaussianVariablewidthFileName.title: Path to file where width array is saved
gaussianVariablewidthFileName.description: Must be specified if and only if LSFType=gaussianVariableWidth
